TitleEnglish: Summoned to Another World for a Second Time
SummaryEnglish: There was once a man who was summoned to another world, and saved it. Of course, he became too popular there, and turned into an isekai-normie. However, that man fell into a "trap", and was forcibly returned to his original world. Moreover, he had to start over as a baby! This is the story of the way-too-fantastic ex-hero who lived as a gloomy high-schooler, as he gets summoned once again to that same other world in a very unexpected development!

1.TitleEnglish: Summoned to Another World for a Second Time
1.SummaryEnglish: After his reincarnation from another world, Setsu leads a new life as a high school student. However, for an unknown reason, he is summoned back to the same world, Eclair. Before he can enjoy his return, he becomes embroiled in the war with the demons that he had originally ended. Though his old comrades rush to his aid, he also notices his old friend's magic on the battlefield. What is going on in the world of Eclair that Setsu enters for the second time?"

2.TitleEnglish: Going on a Trip for a Second Time
2.SummaryEnglish: Setsu sets off for the demonic continent - and into a chance meeting with the granddaughter of a certain merchant he met once in his previous life, who has her own duty to fulfill...

3.TitleEnglish: Frying a Squid for a Second Time
3.SummaryEnglish: Setsu, Ruri, and Levia arrive on the demonic continent. They reconnect with old acquaintances and are swept up in a sinister plot involving the Demon Lord and a mysterious merchant.

4.TitleEnglish: Receiving a Gift for a Second Time
4.SummaryEnglish: The Demon Lord Dezastol reflects on the previous war and the promise of peace she made to Setsu. Meanwhile, Setsu, Levia, and Vlad rush to rescue her from the unwanted marriage to the mysterious Terran Sneeter.

5.TitleEnglish: Following Footsteps for a Second Time
5.SummaryEnglish: While Setsu is fighting his battles on the demonic continent, Yuhi trains to become strong enough to stand by his side. With the help of Elka's tough love, she discovers her own unique kind of determination.

6.TitleEnglish: Master and Pupil for a Second Time
6.SummaryEnglish: Setsu and Levia set off for the Beastmen continent. On their way, they cross paths with Setsu's old friend Alizee and discover she has been battling a mysterious dragon. Together, they unravel the shocking truth.

7.TitleEnglish: Visiting the Beastmen Continent for a Second Time
7.SummaryEnglish: Arriving at the Beastmen continent, Setsu and Levia meet Shironeko, a fierce fighter. When Shironeko is asked to assassinate Setsu, she agrees for the sake of her ill sister. All is not what it seems, though, and Setsu uncovers a tangled web of deceit.

8.TitleEnglish: Fighting a Duel For a Second Time
8.SummaryEnglish: Setsu meets more old allies in the Beastman capital, reuniting with the King Regulus and his daughter Roa. Old rivalries run hot, and Setsu finds himself in a duel that isn't what it seems...

9.TitleEnglish: Summoned to Another World for the First Time
9.SummaryEnglish: In the past, Setsu and Toma are transported to the other world for the first time and Setsu convinces Toma that they can end the war. A strange artifact brings all of Toma's darkest desires to the surface with devastating consequences.

10.TitleEnglish: Arriving at a Battlefield for a Second Time
10.SummaryEnglish: Yuhi reaches the demonic continent alongside the kingdom's forces as both sides ready for a fight. With Setsu still missing on his adventures, they face a desperate battle to hold the line until he arrives.

11.TitleEnglish: Going All-In for a Second Time
11.SummaryEnglish: The final battle gets serious with Setsu's arrival. With his friends old and new alongside him, Setsu is certain they can be victorious and save this world for a second time.

12.TitleEnglish: Fighting the Final Battle for a Second Time
